translation.en: -[Tyler] How's it going? -[man] Oh!
translation.zh: -怎么样啊？-噢！

translation.en: -I'm Tyler. -[man] What's up, Tyler?
translation.zh: -我是泰勒-你好 泰勒

translation.en: [Tyler] Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: -幸会-噢

translation.en: -Curious to see what comes through. -Let's do it.
translation.zh: -很好奇会有什么样的信息传来-我们开始吧

translation.en: Gonna center myself, take deep breaths.
translation.zh: 我会以我自己为中心 深呼吸

translation.en: -[man] Do your thing. -And then we will see what comes in.
translation.zh: 你来吧 然后我们看看会有什么样的信息传来

translation.en: [Tyler sighs] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: We're gonna talk about living people.
translation.zh: 我们先谈一下活着的人

translation.en: -Okay. -[Tyler] Um…
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: There's gonna be something that comes up pertaining to someone having a difficulty breathing,
translation.zh: 会提到在呼吸方面有困难的人

translation.en: either finding a spot on an X-ray of our lungs.
translation.zh: 要不就是在肺部X光片上有斑点

translation.en: There's something coming in,
translation.zh: 有这样的信息传来

translation.en: but it doesn't feel like it's been taken as seriously as it should.
translation.zh: 但感觉没有予以严肃对待

translation.en: My mother.
translation.zh: 我母亲

translation.en: [Tyler] So, if Mom has had some breathin' stuff?
translation.zh: 这么说妈妈有过呼吸问题吗？

translation.en: She said she had a spot on her lung.
translation.zh: 她说她肺部有一个斑点

translation.en: -But that's-- -Yeah.
translation.zh: -但这…-对

translation.en: How did you know that? Like, would it… You felt the spot? Or like…
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？你感觉到了斑点吗？还是…

translation.en: [Tyler] I see it visually. I had a collapsed lung,
translation.zh: 我看见了 我有过肺塌陷

translation.en: but it comes through similar in the sense of literally seeing an X-ray and seeing a spot.
translation.zh: 不过都是X光片上有斑点从这个角度说确实很像

translation.en: [chuckles] That's just… My mind, man.
translation.zh: 真是… 没事 兄弟

translation.en: [Tyler] So we're gonna keep going. Just switching gears a bit.
translation.zh: 我们继续说 稍微换一下主题

translation.en: It's coming in on the cousin level.
translation.zh: 肯定是表亲级别的

translation.en: Oh! Just give me one second.
translation.zh: 稍等

translation.en: [man] Yeah. It hit you, man, if you know what I know.
translation.zh: 嗯 如果你知道我了解的情况你会大会大吃一惊 兄弟

translation.en: Yes, all good. My chest is killing me here,
translation.zh: 对 都挺好 我的胸部痛死了

translation.en: but give me one second.
translation.zh: 不过稍等我一下

translation.en: There's a kind of a feeling I'm getting shot from the side.
translation.zh: 感觉就像我侧面中枪似的

translation.en: Hey, yo.
translation.zh: 哎哟！

translation.en: You're absolutely right.
translation.zh: 你说得太对了

translation.en: I mean, there's no way you would know that.
translation.zh: 你不可能这道这个情况

translation.en: [Tyler] I always used drawing and painting as a way to relax or meditate.
translation.zh: 我总是用画画作为放松和冥想的方式

translation.en: But I never thought the scribbling I do in high school,
translation.zh: 但我没想到我在高中时代的乱画

translation.en: not paying attention to the teacher,
translation.zh: 不注意听老师讲课

translation.en: would end up being part of my career.
translation.zh: 居然会成为我职业生涯的一部分

translation.en: I would sit and scribble, and scribble, and scribble.
translation.zh: 我会坐着乱画

translation.en: One day, I was doodling and started feeling things.
translation.zh: 有一天 我在涂鸦 开始有了感觉

translation.en: So I started implementing them more into readings.
translation.zh: 于是我开始将其用于读心

translation.en: When I'm connecting, I really liken myself to that of a canvas.
translation.zh: 我在连结的时候把自己当作一块画布

translation.en: And the person that comes through paints the picture.
translation.zh: 传信息过来的人作画

translation.en: But in the beginning, it was really difficult to regulate my ability.
translation.zh: 但是在开始的时候控制我的能力真的非常困难

translation.en: I couldn't really turn it up in the sense of increasing it or even really decrease it.
translation.zh: 我没办法去增强或者减弱它

translation.en: Who's that?
translation.zh: 那是谁？

translation.en: When I was ten years old, I was lying in bed. I remember being woken up.
translation.zh: 我十岁的时候 当时我躺在床上我记得被叫醒了

translation.en: When I opened my eyes, I just had this knowingness that my grandmother was going to die.
translation.zh: 当我睁开眼睛时我感觉到我奶奶要去世了

translation.en: As I was explaining this feeling to my mom, the phone rang.
translation.zh: 当我把这种感觉解释给我妈听的时候电话响了

translation.en: My dad was on the other end.
translation.zh: 打电话来的是我爸

translation.en: He gave her the news that my grandmother had just taken her final breath.
translation.zh: 他告诉妈妈我奶奶刚刚去世了

translation.en: It was only years later that I understood that to be a premonition.
translation.zh: 多年之后我才明白这是预感

translation.en: It took years of practice and relaying the information I would get
translation.zh: 进行了多年的练习和传递我所收到的信息

translation.en: to start to get a semblance of control.
translation.zh: 我才开始对其有所控制

translation.en: From the ages of 16 to 18, I was doing readings almost every day.
translation.zh: 从16岁到18岁我几乎每天都在读心

translation.en: Word of mouth spread very quickly.
translation.zh: 口口相传 非常迅速

translation.en: Before I knew it, I had people coming to my front door and leaving notes.
translation.zh: 很快就有人来我家找我 留下纸条

translation.en: And from there, I started getting requests from Southern California.
translation.zh: 从那之后我开始收到来自南加州的邀请

translation.en: With his uncanny ability to connect to those who've passed,
translation.zh: 他有与逝者连结的怪异能力

translation.en: twenty-year-old Tyler Henry blows celebrities' minds off and on camera
translation.zh: 20岁的泰勒·亨利 在娱乐电视台热播剧集《好莱坞灵媒泰勒·亨利》中

translation.en: in his hit E! series Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry.
translation.zh: 在摄像机前面及背后令明星们惊呼神奇

translation.en: My life took a very weird turn.
translation.zh: 我的人生经历了一次非常奇怪的转弯

translation.en: [reporter] The most sought-after clairvoyant around.
translation.zh: 最受人追捧的预言家

translation.en: -You are the real thing. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -你确实货真价实-谢谢

translation.en: Wow!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: [Tyler] When I was nineteen, I began filming a television show.
translation.zh: 我19岁时开始拍摄电视节目

translation.en: Oh my gosh.
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: And from there, I started doing live shows.
translation.zh: 然后我开始做直播节目

translation.en: [announcer] Ladies and gentlemen, Tyler Henry!
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 请欢迎泰勒·亨利！

translation.en: [Tyler] These are in front of an audience of up to 3,000 people.
translation.zh: 这是面对多达3000名观众

translation.en: Hello, everybody!
translation.zh: 大家好！

translation.en: [Tyler] This journey really did make me come full circle
translation.zh: 关于我为什么一开始会开始做这个

translation.en: as to why I started in the first place.
translation.zh: 这段旅程确实使我完成了闭环

translation.en: Filming this show has lent me an opportunity to help people who have a deep need for reading.
translation.zh: 拍摄这部片子让我有机会帮助迫切需要读心的人们

translation.en: When I took the leap and had the courage to share my ability,
translation.zh: 当我跨出这一步鼓起勇气分享我的能力时

translation.en: I was doing it for people who I thought could benefit from it the most.
translation.zh: 我是在为我认为能受益最多的人在做

translation.en: To see how my life has evolved now, being back in that place
translation.zh: 看到我的人生一路走到现在 回到当初的地方

translation.en: has, I think, been a reminder of why I do what I do.
translation.zh: 能够提醒我为什么要做这些事

translation.en: Has anything been coming through for this reading?
translation.zh: 这次读心有什么信息来了吗？

translation.en: There's a lot of feminine energy, so…
translation.zh: 有许多女性能量 所以…

translation.en: -From who you're going to read? -Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: -来自你要读的人？-对

translation.en: My assistant Heather is a big part of my life.
translation.zh: 我的助理希瑟在我的生活中非常重要

translation.en: She's instrumental in getting me from point A to point B
translation.zh: 她帮我从A点到B点

translation.en: because I never know what I'm going into.
translation.zh: 因为我永远都不知道自己会遇上什么

translation.en: The producers don't tell me anything, where I'm going,
translation.zh: 制作人什么都不告诉我 从不告诉我要去哪里

translation.en: who I'm reading, what's going on.
translation.zh: 要读谁的心 是怎么回事

translation.en: All Heather and my mom know is where to drop me off.
translation.zh: 希瑟和我妈只知道要把我送去哪里

translation.en: That's literally it.
translation.zh: 只知道这些

translation.en: There's a bit much feeling of a death and a birth.
translation.zh: 感觉到一生一死

translation.en: Within kind of a short period of one another.
translation.zh: 之间间隔很短

translation.en: It's a weird sensation. It's kind of that vibe of like,
translation.zh: 这种感觉很奇怪 感觉有点像

translation.en: "I die, you live," kind of thing.
translation.zh: “我死你生”这种情况

translation.en: -I dunno. It's weird. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 我也不清楚 很奇怪

translation.en: -Hi! How's it going? -[woman] Hello.
translation.zh: -你好！还好吗？-你好

translation.en: -Welcome to my home. -[Tyler] It's lovely to meet you.
translation.zh: -欢迎来我家-很高兴和你见面

translation.en: I'm having palpitations because I didn't think this day would come.
translation.zh: 我心跳得好快因为我没想到真会有这样一天

translation.en: -[Tyler] Hello, everybody! -Hi!
translation.zh: -你们好啊！-你好！

translation.en: [Tyler] How's it going?
translation.zh: 还好吗？

translation.en: -My beautiful girlfriends. -Oh, hi! How are you?
translation.zh: -我美丽的闺蜜们-噢 你好！

translation.en: -Good to meet you. How are you? -[friend 1] Hi. Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: -幸会 你好吗！-你好 幸会

translation.en: -Very. -[Tyler] Good to see you all.
translation.zh: -非常好-很高兴和你们见面

translation.en: How's it going?
translation.zh: -天哪！-还好吗？

translation.en: -Good. Thank you so much for coming. -Absolutely.
translation.zh: -很好啊 非常感谢你过来-没事

translation.en: -And for hanging out. -[Tyler] This is where it's at.
translation.zh: -感谢你来和我们见面-就是在这里

translation.en: [friend 2] We're so excited to have you.
translation.zh: -你来这里 我们非常激动-对

translation.en: I wouldn't have missed it.
translation.zh: 我可不能错过

translation.en: You don't know how many times we've sat here,
translation.zh: 你不知道有多少次我们坐在这里

translation.en: drank wine, and just dreamt of this moment.
translation.zh: 喝酒 梦想这一刻的到来

translation.en: I'm excited. I already have stuff coming, but I'll explain my process.
translation.zh: 我非常高兴我已经有信息在传过来了 不过我会解释一下我的方法

translation.en: -Let you know what to expect. -Oh my God, that gave me…
translation.zh: -让你们对后面的情况有所预期-天哪！我真是…

translation.en: [Tyler] There's a lot of stuff with this,
translation.zh: 对 有很多内容

translation.en: so it's important for me to get into a certain headspace.
translation.zh: 所以我的头脑进入状态非常重要

translation.en: But I'm excited to see what comes through, and we'll go from there.
translation.zh: 不过看到有这么多信息传来我非常高兴 我们从这里开始

translation.en: -All right? -Sounds good.
translation.zh: -好吗？-好的 挺好的

translation.en: I have my notepad here, as you're familiar with.
translation.zh: 我带了笔记本 你们应该比较熟悉了

translation.en: -[friend 3] I feel my heart jolting. -Mine too. I need a drink of wine.
translation.zh: 我的心已经开始颤动了 -我也是 我得喝一杯酒-我也是

translation.en: That's all right. [friend 3] I don't think my heart's not in my…
translation.zh: -没事的-我的心应该没有…

translation.en: Good. Okay. There, there.
translation.zh: 好 好的 这就对了

translation.en: I had a lot of feminine energy coming through on the way here.
translation.zh: 在来这里的路上我感受到了很强的女性能量

translation.en: Granted, female here, but this person's excited to come through.
translation.zh: 当然是这样啊 这里都是女性 不过这个人传信息过来很兴奋

translation.en: When I get this tier of excitement,
translation.zh: 每次我感到如此程度的兴奋

translation.en: it usually indicates somebody who passed away early,
translation.zh: 通常显示有人英年早逝

translation.en: who wasn't able to hit middle age, is the way that I would describe this.
translation.zh: 一般是没达到中年 我会这样来描述

translation.en: And when I'm connecting with this person, I suspect this is a female.
translation.zh: 当我与这个人连结的时候我感觉是一位女性

translation.en: Without giving it away, can you relate to a female who passed prematurely?
translation.zh: 不要泄露信息 但我要问是否与一名过早离世的女性有关？

translation.en: -Yes. Oh yes. -Okay. Gotcha.
translation.zh: -是的-好的 明白

translation.en: There's a lot of specifics, so I have to connect more deeply.
translation.zh: 有许多具体情况所以我得更深层地去连结

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: So she does bring up this emphasis on a symbol of hummingbirds.
translation.zh: 她着重提到蜂鸟这个符号

translation.en: Any time I see hummingbirds, it almost always indicates
translation.zh: 我看到蜂鸟总会意味着有人有过经历

translation.en: that somebody has had an experience, and it may only be one person,
translation.zh: 我看到蜂鸟总会意味着有人有过经历 可能只有一个人

translation.en: that feels sentimental in some way related to
translation.zh: 某些方面与蜂鸟有关

translation.en: a hummingbird, the way this comes across. It has to be a hummingbird.
translation.zh: 某些方面与蜂鸟有关 一定是有一只蜂鸟

translation.en: If there are other bird-related signs, wings--
translation.zh: 也许是其他与鸟相关的符号 翅膀…

translation.en: Oh, she had a tattoo of a hummingbird!
translation.zh: 她有蜂鸟的纹身

translation.en: -[friend 2] Oh my God! Yes, she did! -That's immediately what I thought of.
translation.zh: -神啊！对 没错！-我立刻就想到了这个

translation.en: I love it. I love it so much.
translation.zh: 我太喜欢了

translation.en: It seems to be a spirit animal thing,
translation.zh: 似乎确实是灵性动物

translation.en: the way this comes across, something she relates to.
translation.zh: 与她有共鸣的东西

translation.en: That's good to keep in mind. Keep your eyes out for that kind of thing.
translation.zh: 这个要记住 要留意这种东西

translation.en: -I can tell that it meant something. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我能看出这是有意义的-好的

translation.en: Give me one sec.
translation.zh: 稍等

translation.en: Trying to symbolically figure this out.
translation.zh: 我想象征性地把它弄清楚

translation.en: Okay, so there would have been a couple things.
translation.zh: 好的 有几件事

translation.en: She had funny music taste, strange.
translation.zh: 她的音乐品味很有意思 很奇怪

translation.en: All over the place.
translation.zh: -到处都是-比如呢？

translation.en: [Tyler] I'll tell you, 'cause it's weird.
translation.zh: 我跟你们说 因为很奇怪

translation.en: -Tell us. -Oh my gosh.
translation.zh: -告诉我们-天啊！

translation.en: Okay. There's a funny thing. If I looked at her, I wouldn't think
translation.zh: 好的 很有意思 如果我看她我不会觉得她会喜欢这种音乐

translation.en: that she would like this specific kind of music.
translation.zh: 如果我看她我不会觉得她会喜欢这种音乐

translation.en: [friend 1] My God. If he says what I think…
translation.zh: 神啊！他不是说这个吧…

translation.en: I have no idea how I'm going to--
translation.zh: 我不知道我会怎么…

translation.en: -[friend 2] Don't tell us. My God. -He wouldn't know.
translation.zh: -别告诉我们 天哪！-他不可能知道

translation.en: I feel almost kind of, I don't know what this is.
translation.zh: 我几乎觉得… 我不知道这是什么

translation.en: There's something funny with it, where I feel like it's not matching when I would look at her
translation.zh: 很有意思我看她的话 感觉不太搭

translation.en: versus what she had going on. But it's--
translation.zh: 和她的情况不太搭 不过…

translation.en: That makes sense.
translation.zh: 有道理

translation.en: -This is what we always talk about. -[Tyler] Weird.
translation.zh: -我们一直说这件事-很奇怪

translation.en: When we're highlighting this person,
translation.zh: 当我们聚焦这个人的时候

translation.en: she comes through as a spitfire, very independent, which is coming across.
translation.zh: 感觉她脾气很大 非常独立

translation.en: -She's a firecracker, spicy. -[woman] Definitely.
translation.zh: -她像炮仗一样 很辣-没错

translation.en: -It's the only way to describe her. -Spice Girls!
translation.zh: -只能这样来描述她-辣妹！

translation.en: -Yes -Spice girl.
translation.zh: -对-辣妹

translation.en: [Tyler] Okay. Give me one sec.
translation.zh: 好的 稍等

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: As a medium, I receive impressions.
translation.zh: 作为灵媒 我会有感觉

translation.en: I get very small tidbits of details
translation.zh: 我会收到很细节的小信息

translation.en: I have to interpret and make sense of based on my previous readings and experience
translation.zh: 我得去解释它根据我以前读心的情况去理解它

translation.en: I try to set the intention,
translation.zh: 在与这些人沟通的过程中

translation.en: as I'm communicating with whoever's coming through, to elaborate on either how they passed,
translation.zh: 我的目的是解释清楚他们是如何逝去

translation.en: what's important to them, the messages that might be meaningful.
translation.zh: 什么对他们是重要的可能有意义的信息

translation.en: When I sit in a reading, I intend to get as much information from that spirit as I can get.
translation.zh: 当我坐下读心的时候我希望从灵魂中获取尽可能多的信息

translation.en: In the six months before she would've passed,
translation.zh: 在她去世之前的半年中

translation.en: she's putting this emphasis on trying to get as healthy as she can get.
translation.zh: 她在努力使自己变得健康

translation.en: And I feel like I'm trying to almost monitor my weight to make sure
translation.zh: 我感觉自己几乎是在监控自己的体重

translation.en: that I'm at a healthy place.
translation.zh: 以确保自己的健康

translation.en: She would have had this susceptibility to diabetes, that kind of thing.
translation.zh: 她比较容易患上糖尿病或者类似的疾病

translation.en: She kind of struck me as that. Does that make sense?
translation.zh: 我感觉她是这样的 是这样吗？

translation.en: -One hundred percent. -That's crazy.
translation.zh: -百分百正确-太离谱了

translation.en: [Tyler] But there is this aspect she is bringing up.
translation.zh: 但是她提到一个方面

translation.en: This feeling of very suddenly realizing that
translation.zh: 感觉到突然发现

translation.en: I feel like I need to go the hospital, or like I need to get medical attention.
translation.zh: 我感觉要去医院 需要有人给我看病

translation.en: She felt like people might have told her, "Oh, it's just nerves. It's normal."
translation.zh: 她觉得有人可能跟她说 “噢 只是紧张罢了 很正常”

translation.en: -Yes. -[Tyler] But she knew something was wrong.
translation.zh: -对-但她知道不对劲

translation.en: I feel kind of almost like something's filling up.
translation.zh: 我感觉就像有东西装满了

translation.en: I don't know really how to describe it, but it feels like something's gone amiss.
translation.zh: 我真的不知道怎么去描述它不过感觉就是不对劲

translation.en: -Hundred percent. -Yes, everything you're saying is…
translation.zh: -百分百正确-对 你说的所有的话都…

translation.en: [Tyler] Gotcha. Okay.
translation.zh: 明白 好的

translation.en: Uh, there's this feeling of being more concerned about somebody else than myself.
translation.zh: 还感觉到相比于对自己更加为另外一个人感到担忧

translation.en: It's 'cause I see my symbol for selflessness.
translation.zh: 因为我看到了无私的符号

translation.en: It's so weird. I was born about three months early, um, as a child,
translation.zh: 很奇怪 我早产三个月

translation.en: and weirdly, I feel like a premature birth.
translation.zh: 很奇怪 我感觉到有早产

translation.en: Someone being born premature.
translation.zh: 有人早产了

translation.en: Some relevance there, but she wasn't born…
translation.zh: 有一些相关 但不是她出生…

translation.en: I don't think it's her who was born premature,
translation.zh: 我觉得不是她早产

translation.en: or some other aspect here I'm trying to unravel.
translation.zh: 或者是其他的方面我现在努力地想去解开

translation.en: -[Tyler] Was she pregnant? -[all] Yes.
translation.zh: -她怀孕了吗？-对

translation.en: Great. Okay, so there's a lot coming in.
translation.zh: 好的 有很多信息在传过来

translation.zh: 你们是怎么认识的？

translation.en: He would tell you a different story, but he tweeted me.
translation.zh: 他的说法会不一样 但事实是他给我发了推特

translation.en: He slid into those DM's.
translation.zh: 他给我发私信

translation.en: Gays, man. They're persistent.
translation.zh: 男同性恋都坚持不懈

translation.en: And don't you forget it.
translation.zh: 你可别忘了

translation.en: I think coming from a small town in Georgia, I feel like he just,
translation.zh: 他来自乔治亚州中部的一个小镇 我觉得他特别想找一个心灵相通的人

translation.en: he really wanted somebody to relate to. I had an immediate connection with him.
translation.zh: 我觉得他特别想找一个心灵相通的人 我当时立即就和他有了感觉

translation.en: [Clint] So as far as your mom's family,
translation.zh: 关于你妈妈的家庭

translation.en: I've hit a brick wall there, and nobody wants to talk.
translation.zh: 我在这方面碰过钉子没人想谈这个问题

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: The majority of the research that I was doing back when this all started
translation.zh: 我开始的时候所作研究的主要部分

translation.en: was with the family DNA research
translation.zh: 是家族DNA研究

translation.en: -[Tyler] Correct. -We didn't know what we were looking for.
translation.zh: -对-我们当时不知道要找什么

translation.en: At first, you did the DNA test. It came back different than you thought.
translation.zh: 先是你做了DNA检测结果与你原先以为的不同

translation.en: But when your mom did it was when, like--
translation.zh: 但当你妈妈做了检测之后…

translation.en: -[Tyler] We really realized. -Shit got weird.
translation.zh: -我们就发现了-情况变得太奇怪了

translation.en: Whoops!
translation.zh: 哎！

translation.en: DNA don't lie.
translation.zh: DNA不会说谎

translation.en: It was only two years ago that my mom found out her mother wasn't her mother.
translation.zh: 两年前我妈妈才发现她母亲并非她的生母

translation.en: Her father wasn't her father.
translation.zh: 她父亲也不是她的生父

translation.en: The siblings she had, she wasn't related to,
translation.zh: 她的兄弟姐妹与她没有血缘关系

translation.en: and we were just stunned. We were in complete shock.
translation.zh: 我们都惊呆了

translation.en: On every level here, there's mystery.
translation.zh: 似乎每一个方面都是迷

translation.en: Absolutely. Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错 对

translation.en: You'd think as a medium, I should be able to call everybody on the other side
translation.zh: 我是灵媒 你以为我可以给另一个世界的人打电话

translation.en: and figure out what happened to my mom.
translation.zh: 弄清楚我妈妈的事

translation.en: But every step of the way, I've hit a wall.
translation.zh: 但是每一步都阻碍重重

translation.en: I'm too biased and connected to the situation to be emotionally objective,
translation.zh: 我倾向性太强 与事件关系太紧密无法在情绪上做到客观

translation.en: and because of that, I need help finding the answers we're seeking.
translation.zh: 因此我需要得到帮助以寻找答案

translation.en: I wanna know how exactly Stella obtained my mom,
translation.zh: 我想知道斯黛拉具体是怎么得到我妈妈的

translation.en: and what my mom's biological mother thought was happening.
translation.zh: 以及我妈妈的生母当时心里的想法

translation.en: Did she know?
translation.zh: 她当时知道吗？

translation.en: Did she think that my mom was going to somebody else?
translation.zh: 她知道我妈妈会去别人那里吗？

translation.en: How did that happen?
translation.zh: 怎么会走到这一步？

translation.en: I have a right to know, and I'm not gonna let anyone stop me.
translation.zh: 我有权利知道我不会让任何人阻止我

translation.en: We just have to figure out who can help.
translation.zh: 我们只需要想明白谁能帮上忙就行

translation.en: Yeah. I just wonder why, like…
translation.zh: 对 我就想知道…

translation.en: This is so convoluted.
translation.zh: 这非常错综复杂

translation.en: [Tyler] We should get some of those stickers.
translation.zh: 我们得弄点贴纸

translation.en: -[Theresa] What stickers? -"Student driver."
translation.zh: -什么贴纸？-“新手司机”

translation.en: -[Theresa] Where? For who? -Right there. See?
translation.zh: -哪里？给谁贴？-那边 看见了吗？

translation.en: You. We'll put them on the back, so people are warned.
translation.zh: 给你 贴在后面 提醒一下别人

translation.en: [Theresa] You're hilarious.
translation.zh: 你真搞笑

translation.en: [Theresa] I predict you're going to have an amazing reading today.
translation.zh: 我预测你今天会读得非常棒

translation.en: I sure hope so.
translation.zh: 希望如此

translation.en: I did have someone come through earlier who passed away in a fire.
translation.zh: 之前确实有死于火灾的人的信息传过来

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Tyler] I could tell this was a male. I'd be interested to see who this is.
translation.zh: 我看得出是男性 我想知道是谁

translation.en: [Theresa] Come on. Buck up. It's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 加油 振作起来 没事的

translation.en: [Tyler] Hello. How's it going?
translation.zh: 你好 怎么样啊？

translation.en: Oh!
translation.zh: 噢！

translation.en: I'm Tyler.
translation.zh: 我是泰勒

translation.en: -What's up? -Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: -你好-幸会

translation.en: -Bring it in. COVID or not. -Aw. Lovely to meet you.
translation.zh: -来抱抱 不管有没有新冠-噢 幸会

translation.en: -Good to meet you too. -Thank you for having me.
translation.zh: -幸会-谢谢你让我过来

translation.en: -Absolutely. -This is so cool.
translation.zh: -不客气-这里好棒啊

translation.en: -[man] Welcome to my world. -Amazing.
translation.zh: -欢迎来到我的世界-非常棒

translation.en: -What's your name? -Cals.
translation.zh: -怎么称呼？-卡尔斯

translation.en: -Cals. Nice to meet you. -You look just like…
translation.zh: -卡尔斯 很高兴认识你-你很像…

translation.en: -Never mind. -[Tyler] Yeah?
translation.zh: -算了-嗯？

translation.en: -Macaulay Culkin. I get him a lot. -[Cals laughs] I wasn't sure.
translation.zh: -麦考利·卡尔金 经常有人说我像他-之前我也不太确定

translation.en: -This is a cool place. What's this studio? -[Cals] Yeah.
translation.zh: -这里很不错 这个录音室叫什么？-对

translation.en: The name of this studio is Stankonia Studios.
translation.zh: 斯坦科尼亚录音室

translation.en: It was named after Outkast's album.
translation.zh: 是以流浪者合唱团的专辑命名

translation.en: Lot of history has been made in this studio.
translation.zh: 这里创造了很多历史

translation.en: [Tyler] I believe it.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: -Curious to see what comes through. -Let's do it.
translation.zh: -很好奇会有什么样的信息传来-我们开始吧

translation.en: -Do you any have objects? -[Cals] Yeah.
translation.zh: -你有物品吗？-有的

translation.en: You can whip 'em out now.
translation.zh: -可以拿出来了-好的

translation.en: [Tyler] Amazing. You can put it right there.
translation.zh: 太棒了 就放这里好了

translation.en: I'm gonna center myself, take deep breaths.
translation.zh: 我会以我自己为中心 深呼吸

translation.en: -[Cals] Do your thing. -We will see what comes in.
translation.zh: -你来吧-然后我们看会有什么样的信息传来

translation.en: [Tyler sighs] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -We're gonna talk about living people. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我们先谈一下活着的人-好的

translation.en: Um, think, think biological family.
translation.zh: 想一下血亲家人

translation.en: There's gonna be something that comes up pertaining to someone having a difficulty breathing,
translation.zh: 会提到在呼吸方面有困难的人

translation.en: either finding a spot on an X-ray of our lungs.
translation.zh: 要不就是在肺部X光片上有斑点

translation.en: There's been either a conversation around it,
translation.zh: 要不就是谈过这个问题

translation.en: but it doesn't feel like it's been taken as seriously as it should--
translation.zh: 但感觉没有予以严肃对待

translation.en: [Cals] My mother.
translation.zh: 我母亲

translation.en: -In the long run. -She said she had a spot on her lung.
translation.zh: -长久以来没有严肃对待-她说她肺部有一个斑点

translation.en: -But that's… -Yeah.
translation.zh: -但这…-对

translation.en: How did you know that? Like, would it… You felt the spot? Or like…
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？你感觉到了斑点吗？还是…

translation.en: [Tyler] I see it visually.
translation.zh: 我看见了

translation.en: Uh, I had a collapsed lung earlier this year.
translation.zh: 我今年早些时候肺部塌陷

translation.en: It does come through similar in the sense of seeing an X-ray and seeing a spot.
translation.zh: 不过都是X光片上有斑点从这个角度说确实很像

translation.en: In early 2020, I had actually had a collapsed lung.
translation.zh: 2020年初 我肺部塌陷

translation.en: It was resting on my heart.
translation.zh: 肺压在我的心脏上

translation.en: While I don't think my ability caused that,
translation.zh: 虽然我并不认为这是我的能力导致的

translation.en: I have a lot of physical effects from readings, and they put me through it.
translation.zh: 但读心对我产生了许多身体上的影响对我造成了很大的压力

translation.en: So I have no idea how this will affect my body in the long run.
translation.zh: 所以我不知道这会对我的身体造成什么样的长期影响

translation.en: Gonna touch the watch, if that's all right.
translation.zh: 如果可以的话 我要拿一下手表

translation.en: -Go for it. -Let's see what comes in.
translation.zh: -拿吧-看看会有什么信息传来

translation.en: Okay. Got you. [smacks lips]
translation.zh: 好的 收到

translation.en: I have these two males that are coming through together
translation.zh: 有两位男性一起传信息过来

translation.en: that I have to talk about.
translation.zh: 我得谈一下

translation.en: Any time people come through together, it means that
translation.zh: 如果有人一起传信息过来 通常意味着他们在另一个世界有某种联系

translation.en: they have some link or bond on the other side.
translation.zh: 通常意味着他们在另一个世界有某种联系

translation.en: Like, I wouldn't connect with one. I'd have to connect with both.
translation.zh: 我不会只与一位连结而是得与两位都连结

translation.en: -[Cals] They're family. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -他们是家人-对

translation.en: It's interesting, the way it comes through.
translation.zh: 传来信息的方式真的很有意思

translation.en: One comes through younger, one older,
translation.zh: 一位年轻一些 一位年长一些

translation.en: in the way this is coming across, but they're both together.
translation.zh: 传来的信息是这样的不过他们是一起的

translation.en: There is a reference to a contemporary that passed.
translation.zh: 提到了一位当代人士去世

translation.en: To explain this 'cause I see this symbolically, if I say that, it's someone on our level.
translation.zh: 解释一下 我说的当代人士是指与我们同一时代的人

translation.en: -Yeah, yeah. -We're gonna talk about their passing.
translation.zh: -对-我们要谈一下他们离世的情况

translation.en: Now, very interesting. They kind of are juxtaposed, is I guess the word.
translation.zh: 现在很有意思 他们有点像是并排着

translation.en: One passing coming with a little bit more baggage than the other.
translation.zh: 一位的包袱比另一位重

translation.en: -Hell yeah. -[Tyler] So it's kind of weird.
translation.zh: -没错-所以有点奇怪

translation.en: The way I'd describe this is,
translation.zh: 我会这样来描述

translation.en: baggage almost always indicates, like, a violent end.
translation.zh: 包袱通常意味着暴力的结局

translation.en: -Something that's like… -[Cals] Yeah.
translation.zh: -比如说…-对

translation.en: -[Tyler] Traumatic to watch a scene. -Yeah. That kind of thing.
translation.zh: -看着会很受创伤 类似的事情-对

translation.en: The other one doesn't strike me with that,
translation.zh: -我感觉另一位就不是这样-不是

translation.en: which is kind of interesting because he gives this feeling of an importance in what you're doing in your career.
translation.zh: 这挺有意思的感觉到你在事业中所做的事的重要性

translation.en: As you do this, it's almost like his soul finds a greater sense of peace.
translation.zh: -你做这一行…-对 感觉就像是他的灵魂找到了更大程度的安宁

translation.en: The interesting thing about his passing
translation.zh: 关于他的离世 有意思的地方在于

translation.en: was that the medical response there, there's just a delay with this.
translation.zh: 医疗反应似乎是有所迟延

translation.en: -[Tyler] I feel like I just sit there. -Yes.
translation.zh: -我觉得就像坐在那里似的-对

translation.en: Why didn't somebody call faster?
translation.zh: 为什么没人快点打电话呢？

translation.en: -Why didn't we get there? -How do you…
translation.zh: -为什么没去呢？-搞什么鬼？你怎么…

translation.en: I know. There was a conversation around it,
translation.zh: 我知道 因为有相关的谈话

translation.en: I can tell, people were like, "What? How did this happen?"
translation.zh: 我看到大家在说：“怎么会这样？”

translation.en: That's exactly what it was.
translation.zh: 当时就是这样

translation.en: We were waiting about,
translation.zh: 我们当时等了大约二三十分钟

translation.en: I don't know, 20, 30 minutes. The hospital was right down the street.
translation.zh: 我们当时等了大约二三十分钟 医院就在同一条街上不远处

translation.en: -We're like, "Where is the ambulance?" -Yeah. Exactly.
translation.zh: -我们心想：“救护车在哪儿呢？”-对啊 就是这样

translation.en: -That's crazy. -[Tyler] It's rough.
translation.zh: -太离谱了-对 很难受

translation.en: He doesn't want anyone to hold onto it.
translation.zh: -他不希望大家还纠结这个问题-嗯

translation.en: When it comes across, it gives him this feeling of not wanting them to think they could've done it different--
translation.zh: 传过来的信息是他不希望大家觉得是有谁事情没做好

translation.en: -That's crazy. -Should've been immediate.
translation.zh: -对 太离谱了-应该立刻处理的

translation.en: So if you could share like his name, a little bit about him…
translation.zh: 你可以说说他的名字 他的情况

translation.en: That's my older cousin, Ducky,
translation.zh: 是我表哥杜其

translation.en: who just kinda looked out for me a lot.
translation.zh: 他非常照顾我

translation.en: Big, lovable guy. Will flip a dumpster for you.
translation.zh: 很好的一个人 会帮你倒垃圾

translation.en: -You know. He's a big, big guy. Big guy. -[Tyler] Yeah.
translation.zh: -个子特别大-嗯

translation.en: Heart of gold, though, man. Doesn't matter the situation.
translation.zh: 心地善良 不论是什么情况

translation.en: Whatever it was, he's coming through in the clutch.
translation.zh: 都很乐意来帮你

translation.en: So, basically, me and him worked at a job
translation.zh: 我们以前一起干活

translation.en: that he had, that, uh… We were making, like, drywall and stuff.
translation.zh: 我们以前一起做石膏墙

translation.en: I was getting comfortable at the job.
translation.zh: 我当时做那份工作很舒服

translation.en: I'm like, "I'm making good money,"
translation.zh: 我心想待遇挺不错

translation.en: but he was like, "Do the music. Do the music. Don't get comfortable here."
translation.zh: 但是他说：“去做音乐不要安于现状”

translation.en: -And then-- -Yeah.
translation.zh: -然后…-嗯

translation.en: He basically died of a heart attack at the job and--
translation.zh: 他工作的时候心脏病发去世 然后…

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: [Cals] He worked himself to death.
translation.zh: 他把自己给累死了

translation.en: He's a big part of my influence, and this new fire I got. Know what I mean?
translation.zh: 他对我的影响很大 给我很大的动力

translation.en: I love that. That's a gift you carry with you every day.
translation.zh: 非常好 但这是你的天赋

translation.en: What a blessing.
translation.zh: -对-真是神的恩赐

translation.en: -Big blessing. -[Tyler] Amazing.
translation.zh: -没错-太好了

translation.en: -That's just-- -[Tyler] I'm so glad.
translation.zh: -这真是…-我很高兴

translation.en: My mind, man. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 天哪！兄弟

translation.en: So we're gonna keep going. They're switching gears a little bit.
translation.zh: 我们继续说 稍微换一下主题

translation.en: [Tyler] There…
translation.zh: 这样

translation.en: Uh, okay. That's interesting.
translation.zh: 好的 有意思

translation.en: This is really weird.
translation.zh: 这非常奇怪

translation.en: They're showing me shoes for some reason. Shoes.
translation.zh: 不知为什么 在给我看鞋子

translation.en: Who's showing you shoes?
translation.zh: 谁在给你看鞋子？

translation.en: [Tyler] It's coming in on the cousin level for sure.
translation.zh: 肯定是表亲级别的

translation.en: Why would we be thinking about red shoes?
translation.zh: 我们为什么会在想红色的鞋子呢？

translation.en: Uh, he had these… I had this pair of Varsity Red Jordans.
translation.zh: 我有一双红色乔丹鞋

translation.en: And he used to be like, "Bruh, please let me wear these."
translation.zh: 他以前会说：“兄弟借我穿一下嗯 求你了”

translation.en: He loved those red shoes.
translation.zh: 他很喜欢这双红色球鞋

translation.en: -[Tyler] Weird. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真奇怪-对

translation.en: [Tyler] Okay. This guy, I feel like would've passed away… In all honesty, it comes across, like…
translation.zh: 好的 这个人的去世 说实话

translation.en: -It's some heavy stuff. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -感觉是比较沉重-对

translation.en: [Tyler] This is one of those interesting things where you get a reference to "Candle in the Wind." That was a weird thing to say. [laughs]
translation.zh: 很有意思 就像《风中之烛》这么说确实很奇怪

translation.en: But it's usually a reference that means living every day to the fullest and
translation.zh: 但通常意味着每一天都过得很得意

translation.en: kind of passing away too early or too soon.
translation.zh: 然后英年早逝

translation.en: Yeah, he'd crack a bottle open at 2:30 in the afternoon
translation.zh: 对 他会下午两点半开一瓶酒

translation.en: just to live. You know?
translation.zh: 尽情地生活

translation.en: He made sure he did everything he was planning to do before he left.
translation.zh: 他一定要在离世之前把所有的事都做了

translation.en: [Tyler] Some people live to be 90, and don't live at all.
translation.zh: 有的人活到90岁但从来就不曾生活过

translation.en: -Yeah. Facts. Facts. -[Tyler] Right? So… yeah.
translation.zh: -对 事实如此-对吧？嗯

translation.en: He's referring to somebody like "Mickey" or "Mikey"?
translation.zh: 他在说一个叫“米奇”或者“麦奇”的人

translation.en: Or something.
translation.zh: 或者是一样东西

translation.en: -Who's it coming from? -[Tyler] It's coming from one of the two,
translation.zh: -我…-谁那边的？ 两人之中的一人

translation.en: but I can't understand why. That's why I'm not confident in it.
translation.zh: 但是我不明白是为什么所以我不太有信心

translation.en: It's who they're watching over or around. It usually refers to a person.
translation.zh: 是他们在看的人 通常是指人

translation.en: We'll keep that in mind in the future.
translation.zh: -我们记住这一点-好的

translation.en: We're gonna keep going. They're having me talk about
translation.zh: 我们继续

translation.en: finishing something up or completing something.
translation.zh: 他们要我谈谈完成一件事

translation.en: It's interesting
translation.zh: 很有意思

translation.en: There's gonna be something either involving their voice, a recording.
translation.zh: 会是关于他们的声音的东西、录音

translation.en: -Something that gets included. [chuckles] -Yeah. [laughs]
translation.zh: -包含的一些东西-对

translation.en: And it's just, like, almost like a nod to them in, in a musical piece.
translation.zh: 就好像在音乐中向他们点头致意

translation.en: We used to… I used to come into town all the time.
translation.zh: 我以前经常进城里

translation.en: This is on the contemporary, on our level.
translation.zh: 是当代的 我们这个层次的

translation.en: And uh, we used to get that, throw some beats on, and we'd just freestyle.
translation.zh: 我们以前会伴奏 然后自由演唱

translation.en: -And I have the last recording. -[Tyler] Right.
translation.zh: -最后的录音在我这里-嗯

translation.en: From when I went back out of town, before I got that news that he had passed.
translation.zh: 当时我从城里回去我还不知道他已经去世

translation.en: -[Tyler] Yeah. -Uh…
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: And I don't know how the hell you'd know that I had a recording of him.
translation.zh: 我不知道你怎么会知道我有他的录音

translation.en: Yeah. It's big. It seems important,
translation.zh: 对 很重要 似乎很重要

translation.en: and they show a lot of pride around it.
translation.zh: 对这个显得很自豪

translation.en: They feel very like, whoo! Like, I feel happy about this.
translation.zh: 感觉很满意

translation.en: I feel, in this way, his legacy will live on in an interesting way.
translation.zh: 他的遗志以这种有趣的方式传承下去

translation.en: -There's a pat on the back around that. -Yeah. That's crazy.
translation.zh: -对这个非常认可-对 太离谱了

translation.en: [Tyler] Please know that's important.
